query: Could you help create a 5-day travel plan for a party of 5? We will be departing from Santa Fe and plan to visit 2 cities in Texas from March 10th to March 14th, 2022. We have a total budget of $6,400. We require accommodations where smoking is allowed and we'd prefer to have entire rooms. Please note that we do not intend to take any flights for this journey.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Abilene,Amarillo]
